## Issue Marked as Stale

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has had no activity for 60 days.

**What happens next:**
- This issue will be closed in 7 days if no further activity occurs
- You can prevent closure by commenting with updates or additional information
- If closed, the issue can be reopened if new information becomes available

**Why do we mark issues as stale?**
- Keeps the issue tracker focused on active problems
- Ensures we're working on current, relevant issues
- Frees up maintainer bandwidth for active concerns

If this issue is still relevant, please comment to keep it open. Even a simple "still relevant" comment will prevent automatic closure.

Thank you for your contribution to AINative Studio!
